firewall: Imasefa kuchuluka kwa magalimoto pamanetiweki potengera malamulo angapo
kachilombo: Mapulogalamu oyipa omwe adapangidwa kuti azifanana ndi kufalikira
pulogalamu yaumbanda: Mawu ochulukirapo ophatikiza ma virus, nyongolotsi, Trojans, ndi zina.
chinyengo: Maimelo achinyengo omwe amayesa kunyengerera ogwiritsa ntchito kuti apereke zambiri
ransomware: Malware omwe amabisa mafayilo, amafuna kuti alipire kuti atsitsidwe
kubisa: Njira yosanthula deta kuti isawerengedwe popanda kiyi
decryption: Njira yochotsa deta yobisika kubwerera ku mawonekedwe owerengeka
kusatetezeka: Kufooka mu mapulogalamu kapena dongosolo lomwe lingagwiritsidwe ntchito
dyera masuku pamutu: Code kapena njira yomwe imatengera mwayi pachiwopsezo
kuphwanya deta: Kufikira mosaloledwa kapena kutulutsa zidziwitso zachinsinsi
mawu achinsinsi: Mndandanda wachinsinsi wa zilembo zomwe zimagwiritsidwa ntchito potsimikizira
kutsimikizika kwazinthu ziwiri: Pamafunika chitsimikiziro chowonjezera kupitilira mawu achinsinsi
kuyesa kulowa: Zoyeserera zoyeserera zovomerezeka kuti mupeze zofooka mudongosolo
ziro tsiku kuukira: Imapezerapo mwayi pachiwopsezo chomwe wogulitsa mapulogalamu sakudziwa
boti: Makompyuta omwe ali ndi kachilombo omwe amayendetsedwa ndi wowukira
kukana kuukira kwa ntchito: Kusefukira kwadongosolo ndi magalimoto kuti asapezeke
mwayi wolowera: Kuwongolera omwe ali ndi zilolezo pazothandizira
njira yodziwira intrusion: Imayang'anira maukonde kapena machitidwe azinthu zosaloledwa
kuyankha kwa chochitika: Ndondomeko zomwe zimatsatiridwa pamene chochitika chachitetezo chikuchitika
kuwerengetsa zowopseza: Kuzindikira ndikuwunika zomwe ziwopsezo ndi zovuta zomwe zingakhalepo
kasamalidwe ka zigamba: Njira yogwiritsira ntchito zosintha kuti mukonze zovuta
zosunga zobwezeretsera: Kupanga kopi ya data kuti muteteze ku kutaya
kuchira tsoka: Konzani kubwezeretsa machitidwe ndi ntchito pambuyo pa kusokonezeka
digito forensics: Kufufuza ndi kusanthula umboni wa digito
